basic_info.description: My name is Terese Mihalcin. I am a Web Developer at Creative Circle Media Solutions. I have been employed there for over two years. My day to day work has a direct impact on local newspaper and other media companies. I am passionate about creating flexible and reusable code that solves real world problems. I am comfortable collaborating with clients and making sure their needs are met. I regularly use PHP MySQL for backend and data processes, and HTML, CSS and Javascript for Frontend Display. I enjoy working with python and experimenting with Javascript Frameworks in my spare time. As for my education, I have studied Computer Science at Seton Hill University for four years, and earned my BS in Computer Science in May 2022. I feel that the tools I received as Seton Hill University gave me the ability to follow the path I am aiming for. Outside of my studies, I played collegiate volleyball at Seton Hill for four years. I still continue to enjoy volleyball in various, more casul, adult leagues. Additionally, I also enjoy many outdoor activities such as hiking, biking, and kayaking.

projects.title: Athletics Scheduling Application(Web)
projects.description: One of the most comprehensive software engineering project I worked on. I was one of four group members. This application supported two platforms, Web and IOS, these images are screenshots from the view I made for the web version. I worked on the frontend development and design of both platforms.

projects.title: Athlete Scheduling Application(IOS)
projects.description: This is the IOS version of the Athlete Portal Application. this roject was completed my Junior year. I was in a group of four other students. I primarily worked on the front-end of this application. I developed majority of the ScheduleFormView.swift and the SportSelectView.swift files, which allow the user to select their sport and the facility they want to use

projects.title: Exercise Planner/Educational Android App
projects.description: This is an Exercise planning/educational workout Android mobile app. I desinged and developed this app from scratch my senior year. I used Java and android studio to create it. Currently this is still a Work in progress

projects.title: NP problem Mario Kart Simulation
projects.description: This is an NP problem I completed. It simulates going through a Mario Kart track, with the goal of finding the optimal path. The track is one loop with 6 mushrooms and 3 shortcuts. The probability of hitting a mushroom, and hitting a shortcut was determined. but running the code multiple times amd analyzing the results, the optimal path was found.

projects.title: The Hotel Problem
projects.description: This is a algorithm problem I completed. The goal was to create a city with a number of hotels and a larger number of citizens. Each hotel had a certain number of guests it could accomodate, and each citizen was assigned the closest hotel to them. Each time the algorithm is run the location of the hotels and citizens are randomized, my algorithm

projects.title: Potential Mobile App Project Plan
projects.description: A detailed project plan for a mobile curbside ordering app for a local coffee shop. Includes a System Request and a thorough Feasibility Analysis.
